Chrome Extensions JavaScript, HTML, CSS for Chrome

EPL Mate

With the 2013/14 League NBC is offering unprecedented coverage on its networks and online. Never before has the US had such access to the live matches from the premiere football league in the world. EPL Mate is a simple tool to put the upcoming EPL Schedule always within sight. Including Desktop Notifications when coverage begins for your Club.

Visit EPL Mate

CowBoom Watcher

CowBoom Watcher methodically monitors the popular pre-owned and refurbished electronics retailer for newly available deals of the day. Every so often a flash sale takes place in a product line as new laptops, tables, mobiles, etc are discounted on the front page throughout the day. The only way to stay on top of these sales is by constantly monitoring for changes. CowBoom Watcher does the job.

Visit CowBoom Watcher

Reddit - For Hire

This simple extension checks reddit.com/r/forhire/new every 5 minutes for new Hiring posts and caches the 25 newest posts. These can then be viewed from the extension popup icon. New posts trigger an alert icon to let you know something you've yet to see was found.

Visit Reddit - For Hire

Auto Woot!

Auto woot! runs in the background monitoring the Woot! network for new sales. Newly found items are automatically displayed in notifications, while all sales are available for viewing through the menu popup at any time. An excellent tool to keep up to date on the daily sales and track Woot! Off sales.

Visit Auto Woot!
